original_text: And certain of them had the charge of the ministering vessels, that they should bring them in and out by tale.
korean_text: 그 중에 어떤 자는 섬기는 데 쓰는 기구를 맡아서 그 수효대로 들여가고 수효대로 내오며

sentences.original_text: And certain of them had the charge
sentences.korean_translation: 그들 중 어떤 사람들은 책임을 맡았으며

sentences.original_text: that they should bring them in
